about_the_game:
Like this game please add to the wish list ~

Game World View：

In "King of Conquerors" you will embark on a journey filled with mystery and peril. This is a fantasy world torn apart by war, where malevolent creatures roam unchecked, and magic and swords are essentials for every adventurer's survival. As a fearless hero, you will lead your team into the depths of this ancient land, uncovering conspiracies lurking in the shadows and confronting bloodthirsty foes.

Aromantic adventure：


Go out for adventure by day and have sex by night! More than 10 female characters to have sex with!



Conquer all odds with toughness, build a harem, and have fun!

Game characteristics：

30 to 40 hours of game time
More than 500,000 words of text and a compelling story
Over 400+ 3D animated CGs
Easy-to-learn turn-based battles with strategy
Various types of beautiful girls and a large number of sexy scenes

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game contains some 3D animated sex scenes, harem, sexy and passionate girls.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
- All sexual acts in the game are consensual.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

name: King of Conquerors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Step into a world rife with monsters and magic, where battles are a constant. As a fearless hero, you will command your team with strategy and wit, employing skills and sorceries. Experience complex relationships and adult narratives as you forge a new order and determine the fate of the world.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
